body_content.explanation:
short for 
virtual actor : an image of an actor created by a computer, used for example in a computer game or instead of a real actor in some scenes of a film, etc.:
examples: We are beginning to see the use of computer generated vactors (virtual actors) that are indistinguishable from real actors in movies and TV shows.
The newsreader in the movie is a "vactor" (virtual actor), created using digital animation.
